MaxNumberOfLayers: This option controls the maximum editing layers that can be added to a Landscape
MaxComponents: Maximum Dimension of Landscape in Components
MaxImageImportCacheSizeMegaBytes: Maximum Size of Import Image Cache in MB
PaintStrengthGamma: Exponent for the Paint Tool Strength
DefaultLandscapeMaterial: Default Landscape Material will be prefilled when creating a new landscape.
BrushSizeUIMax: Maximum size that can be set via the slider for the landscape sculpt/paint brushes
BrushSizeClampMax: Maximum size that can be set manually for the landscape sculpt/paint brushes
HLODMaxTextureSize: Maximum size of the textures generated for landscape HLODs
